import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "../App.css" import "./HomePage.css" import SearchBar from '../components/SearchBar' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import BooksList from '../components/BooksList'; import TopicList from '../components/TopicList'; import { getAllBooks, getAllTags } from '../api/requests'; const HomePage = () => { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]); const [topics, setTopics] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getAllBooks(setBooks); getAllTags(setTopics) }, []) return (
